bill.summary:
Pandemic and Public Health Emergency Support for the Elderly and Persons with Disabilities Act
This bill provides funds for the Department of Housing and Urban Development to provide additional housing support services to elderly individuals and individuals with disabilities in federally owned or subsidized housing in response to the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) public health emergency.
